alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:36PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Moderate to heavy rainfall will impact portions of central Stillwater and central Sweet Grass Counties through at least 430 PM MDT... At 330 PM MDT, Doppler radar was an area of moderate to heavy rainfall from near Columbus to just north of Big Timber, slowly west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Moderate to heavy rainfall with rates up to an inch an hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding of water over roadways, minor street flooding and flooding of roadside ditches. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is occurring over saturated soils which could lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Beartooth Foothills; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass
